name: ContactFaq
description: Split-panel contact section with CTA card on left and FAQ accordions on right.

ctaDescription.example: Let's get started with a brief intro call.

content.example: Your subscription covers end-to-end digital design services...

propsSchema.faqs: Array<{ id: string, title: string, content: string }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect on panels)
propsSchema.showCard?: boolean (default: true - controls accordion card styling)

usageExample: <ContactFaq faqs={[{ id: '1', title: "What's included?", content: 'Your subscription covers...' }]} ctaTitle="Book an intro call" ctaDescription="Let's get started with a brief intro call." ctaButton={{ text: 'Book a Free Call', href: '#contact' }} ctaIcon={Phone} useInvertedBackground="noInvert" animationType="slide-up" />
dont: Do not use more than 4 items
